comment.body: Good to see you are active here now:)
@bot , why do you use chinese browsers? I'm always telling people to avoid them. Are  you a chinese?
@bot , how do you manage to use ɃǾȾ  and Bot at the same time? these two are at different hub.
seems that you use one site to be merger site and hub, causing the error. IMO merger site and hub should be separately two site.
@ɃǾȾ:  how do you control which profile to use or to publish? did you modify the python code? or other tricks?
@ɃǾȾ: seems that you use one site to be merger site and hub, causing the error. IMO merger site and hub should be separately two site.
@ɃǾȾ: Why your merged-ZeroMe/ZeroMe.db is signed in content.json? .db should not be signed and published.
